text: Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjeyya nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 23. Should any bhikkhunī engage in various types of trade, (the article obtained) is to be forfeited and confessed.
